title: sunO sakhi
sahitya:
sunO sakhi mEri man kI darda rI


caraNam 1    jab phitImEm rang-mahal mE sej palang par taDkE jAtI
    caraNam 2    bElA camEli daunA mAruvA campayi gulAb kI hAr banAti
    caraNam 3    jaisE jal bin tarasat panchi taras rahI mErO piyA bin chAtI
    caraNam 4    sOvat nAhin lAgE gOri nidrA bIc bIc piyA hu bulAtI
    caraNam 5    nisi din bhar cOvA rE candan atar aragajA ang lagAti
